name: Octavia Hill walk at Brandelhow Park, Derwent Water, North Lakes Outdoors

ai.summary: A scenic 7 km moderate hike around Derwent Water’s Brandelhow Park, featuring lakeside paths, woodland sections, and views of the surrounding fells.
ai.terrain_summary: Mixed terrain with well-marked trails: compact gravel and packed earth near the water, grassy banks, occasional rocky patches, and some steps or stiles in woodland areas. Moderate elevation changes and potential mud in wet conditions.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather conditions before and during your walk; Derwent Water can experience rapidly changing conditions. Stay on marked paths, keep to the right side where required, and monitor children and dogs. Wear sturdy footwear, bring water, a map or GPS, and a charged phone. Be cautious on slippery surfaces when wet and be mindful of other hikers and seasonal crowds.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking boots or trail shoes
Map or GPS device, or offline maps on phone
Optional: compact headlamp for late finishes

seo.title: Octavia Hill Walk at Brandelhow Park – Derwent Water (7 km, Moderate) | North Lakes Outdoors
seo.meta_description: Explore a 7 km moderate lakeside hike at Brandelhow Park, Derwent Water. Get terrain, safety tips, gear lists, and the best seasons for this North Lakes outing.
